title: The Case Against Adnan Syed - Addendum 2 – The One Who Wasn’t There

content:encoded:
March 21, 2019 / Jon Cryer hosts addendum 2 covering episode 2 of the HBO docuseries. He is joined by Laura Trujillo and Susan Simpson as they discuss #TheCaseAgainstAdnanSyed. [Image: Director Amy Berg and Laura Trujillo at the NYC premiere of the series.]

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Function of Beauty.

www.functionof.com/Undisclosed

#undisclosed #udaddendum #freeadnan #justiceforhae
